user.title: PSKReporter Monitor Type
user.description: Choose how you want to monitor PSKReporter propagation data.

data_description.monitor_type: Personal tracks your callsign activity. Global shows network-wide propagation.

callsign.title: Personal Monitor Setup
callsign.description: Enter your amateur radio callsign and select the monitoring direction.

data_description.direction: Choose whether to monitor received spots, transmitted spots, or both

error.invalid_callsign: Invalid callsign format. Please enter a valid amateur radio callsign.
error.callsign_required: Callsign is required for personal monitor mode.

abort.already_configured: This monitor configuration is already set up

data_description.count_only: Only count spots without storing details (reduces memory usage)
data_description.sample_rate: Process 1 in N messages (higher = less CPU, 1 = all messages)
data_description.min_distance: Only show spots beyond this distance (0 = no minimum)
data_description.max_distance: Only show spots within this distance (0 = no maximum)
data_description.mode_filter: Only show spots using these modes (empty = all modes)
data_description.callsign_allow: Only include spots involving these callsigns (comma-separated, e.g., W1AW,K1ABC)
data_description.country_allow: Only include spots from these DXCC country codes (comma-separated, e.g., 291,100)
data_description.country_block: Exclude spots from these DXCC country codes (comma-separated)
